title: The Anarchic Consort of the Prince - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Amnesia   Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Clever Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Multiple Identities   Multiple Transported Individuals   Politics   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Transmigration
author: Xi Zi Qing   西子情
description:
Yun Qian Yue, the sole legitimate daughter of the Yun Wangfu in the Heavenly Saint Dynasty, was a well-known anarchic young girl who behaved arrogantly and had a bad reputation. During a poem-appreciation gathering, she almost died in a fight for her lover’s favor.

Meanwhile, Li Yun, who was laying down her life for her country, had her soul fall into another world and was reborn as Yun Qian Yue.

An anarchic young girl vs. a young female general – her arrival brought a great change in the seemingly peaceful Heavenly Saint Dynasty.

You said I was arrogant?

I was anarchic?

I was actually the first-class waste of the Heavenly Saint Dynasty, the legitimate daughter of the Yun Wangfu, the designated Crown Princess, and the most distinguished female in the whole Dynasty?

Damn it!

You really had to force me to tell the truth that I feigned all these things?>
